Is it possible to create a TestCase sublcass that implements the Runnable
interface?  When I tried, javac complained that:

The method void run() declared in class com.peregrine.gis.TestLinkThread
cannot override the method of the same signature declared in class
junit.framework.TestCase.  They must have the same return type.

    [javac]   public void run()

--
